CodeList.Name: Sex of Participants Response

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist relevant to the specific sex, either male, female, or mixed of the subject group being studied.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction. (NCI)
A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both. (NCI)
A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Sex of Study Group Terminology
